item.title: About
item.author: tagood67@gmail.com
item.description: Company: Third generation family business. Carl Good, Troy Good and Sean Good We believe in providing a quality home to ensure repeat and referral business achieved by home owner satisfaction. Building your home should be an exciting experience. Goods Construction will help you in every step of the way from start to finish. We will do our best to answer any and all of the questions you might have while building your new home.

item.title: Services
item.author: tagood67@gmail.com
item.description: Residential Projects: New Home Construction Home Remodel Home Additions Home Restoration Kitchen Remodel Bath Remodel Tile Installation Floors/Showers Finished Basements Garages Window Installation Door Installation Electrical Repairs Roofs Shingled/Steel Features: Energy Saving Features Green Products Fine Craftsmanship Professional Service Commercial Projects: New Construction
